content: *from interweave * > these handy little cases designed to hold your cell phone and music player are quick to make they require a little bit of construction still done with crochet embroidery is only a suggestion keep them in your purse or tote or on yourself with the optional straps *sizes and yarn * cell phone 3 5 x 6 music player 3 x 4 5 any of these cases can be made with one skein each of two colors *also needed * large snaps size 4 one for each case sewing needle and thread for snaps safety pins yarn needle for working in ends and embroidery small piece of sew-on velcro for music case 1 set of 75 2cm d rings for cell phone case optional
